scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:creator" "npm run dev:fund" "npm run dev:trade"
scripts.dev:creator: cd creator_tracker && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:creator && npm run build:fund && npm run build:trade
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.build:creator: cd creator_tracker && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.build:fund: cd fund_tracker && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.build:trade: cd trade_tracker && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../creator_tracker && npm install && cd ../fund_tracker && npm install && cd ../trade_tracker && npm install
